long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wayfair Reviews Extractor is a powerful browser extension that simplifies the process of extracting customer reviews from Wayfair. With a single click, you can effortlessly export all reviews for any product into an organized CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel) file.

Key Features
- Comprehensive Review Data Extraction: Easily scrape reviewer names, ratings, comments, images, timestamps, and more without any coding required.
- AI Review Summary: Gain valuable insights with the ChatGPT-powered Review Summary feature, which analyzes and summarizes reviews, providing advantages, disadvantages, improvement suggestions, and a recommendation on whether to buy.
- Intuitive Interface: Our user-friendly interface allows anyone to export data for market research, trend analysis, or maximizing customer insights, saving you significant time and effort.
- Efficient Scraping Process: Simply open any Wayfair product page, click the "Download Reviews" button, and wait for the process to complete. Then, download the data in your preferred format (CSV, JSON, or XLSX) for seamless integration with Excel or other tools.

How to Use
1. Open any product on Wayfair.com;
2. Click the "Download Reviews" button next to the review numbers to initiate the scraping process.
3. Wait for the process to complete. Click "Download Reviews" in the popup area to download the data in CSV, JSON, or XLSX format.
4. (Optional) Click the "AI Review Summary" button to generate a detailed analysis, including advantages, disadvantages, improvement suggestions, and a recommendation on whether to buy.

Streamline your customer insights and make informed business decisions with Wayfair Reviews Extractor. Unlock the power of comprehensive review data and AI-driven analysis with just a few clicks.

Data Privacy 
The data you work with remains confined to your local machine and does not traverse our servers at any point.

Disclaimer 
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with Wayfair.
